entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoria (Hartland)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Victoria Int'l Airport 07:00 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Partly Cloudy
Temperature: 4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 3.9°C
Wind: NNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 near Haro Strait this afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:22 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 near Haro Strait. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 06:22 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:22 AM PST Saturday 28 January 2023
